客弄り: (きゃくいじり) - involving the audience (by talking to them, bringing them on stage, etc.)
客引き: (きゃくひき) - touting; tout; barker; pander
客星: (きゃくしょう) - celestial body seen only for a short time (e.g. comet)
客止め: (きゃくどめ) - draw a full house
客死: (きゃくし) - dying abroad; dying in a foreign land
客殿: (きゃくでん) - reception hall (in a temple or palace)
客用: (きゃくよう) - for use of customers or guests
客膳: (きゃくぜん) - low tray of food for guests
客観: (かくかん) - object (as opposed to subject)
客観主義者: (きゃっかんしゅぎしゃ) - objectivist
客観的: (きゃっかんてき) - (ant: 主観的) objective
客観的観念論: (きゃっかんてきかんねんろん) - objective idealism
客観視: (きゃっかんし) - objective point of view
客賓: (まろうと) - visitor from afar; guest
客足: (きゃくあし) - customer traffic; customers; custom
客間: (きゃくま) - parlor; parlour; guest room
客離れ: (きゃくばなれ) - customers losing interest in product or shop
宣する: (せんする) - to announce; to declare
宣ふ: (のたまう) - to say; to be pleased to say (hint of sarcasm)
宣べる: (のべる) - to state; to express; to mention
宣べ伝える: (のべつたえる) - to proclaim (e.g. gospel)
宣伝ビラ: (せんでんビラ) - promotional leaflet; handbill; flyer
宣伝係: (せんでんがかり) - publicist; public relations officer; press agent; propagandist; flack
宣伝効果: (せんでんこうか) - impact of publicity or propaganda
宣伝屋: (せんでんや) - one skilled at obtaining publicity
宣伝工作: (せんでんこうさく) - (yoji) propaganda work; propaganda efforts (maneuvers)
宣伝攻勢: (せんでんこうせい) - (yoji) propaganda campaign (offensive); advertising (promotional) offensive
宣伝文句: (せんでんもんく) - sales message; sales copy
宣伝機関: (せんでんきかん) - publicity arm or organ
宣伝活動: (せんでんかつどう) - propaganda activities
宣伝費: (せんでんひ) - publicity or advertising expenses
宣伝路線: (せんでんろせん) - (yoji) (adopting) a publicity (an advertising) policy; a propaganda line
宣伝部: (せんでんぶ) - advertising department; public relations department; PR department
宣告書: (せんこくしょ) - (written) judgement or verdict (judgment)
宣命: (せみょう) - imperial edict (written in a classical grandiose style)
宣命を含める: (せんみょうをふくめる) - to make someone understand their fate; to reason with; to persuade; to deliver an imperial edict (which cannot be refused)
宣命体: (せんみょうたい) - writing style in the manner of an imperial edict
宣戦布告: (せんせんふこく) - declaration of war; proclamation of war
宣教: (せんきょう) - religious mission; religious proclamation
宣旨: (ぜじ) - written imperial order (late Heian period)
宣明暦: (せんみょうれき) - Tang lunar calendar, used for 823 years in Japan
宣耀殿: (せんにょうでん) - ladies' pavilion (of the inner Heian Palace)
宣言の有効範囲: (せんげんのゆうこうはんい) - scope of declaration
宣言型マクロ命令: (せんげんけいマクロめいれい) - declarative macro instruction
宣言型言語: (せんげんがたげんご) - declarative language
宣言完結文: (せんげんかんけつぶん) - declarative sentence
宣言形言語: (せんげんがたげんご) - declarative language
宣言済み具象構文: (せんげんずみぐしょうこうぶん) - declared concrete syntax
宣言部分集合: (せんげんぶぶんしゅうごう) - declaration subset
宣誓人: (せんせいじん) - affiant (person who executes an affidavit)
宣誓供述書: (せんせいきょうじゅつしょ) - affidavit
宣誓式: (せんせいしき) - administration of an oath
宣誓陳述書: (せんせいちんじゅつしょ) - sworn statement
室を出る: (しつをでる) - to leave the room
室内協奏曲: (しつないきょうそうきょく) - {music} chamber concerto; concerto di camera
室内外: (しつないがい) - indoor and outdoor
室内実験: (しつないじっけん) - lab test; in-house test
